thread.section_title: Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great all-round hotel
thread.title_full: Great all-round hotel - Review of Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 1FussyTraveller
title: Great all-round hotel
text:
Stayed for a weekend with the family. We took two adjoining suites.
Ate at Il Carpaccio, which is a good one-Michelin-star restaurant. Good attentive service and nice food.
The rooms were spacious, with interesting décor; generally very pleasant. If you have a room with a fancy loo you will be amused.
The hotel's location near to Avenue des Champs-Élysées and the Arc de Triomphe is great.
The staff were very attentive as one would expect at this type of hotel.
Rooms are expensive, but that was expected.
